content.rendered:
Welcome to the home of Bridge Careers Travel Agencies – A Tulsa Medical Staffing & Tulsa Business Staffing Company

At Bridge Careers Travel Agencies we specialize in helping serve our community in 3 unique ways:
  1. We connect growing companies with exceptional talent. If you are an employer and you find yourself looking for excellent people to join your team, contact us today.
  2. At Bridge Career we connect qualified people with great jobs. If you are looking for a quality job in Tulsa, contact us today.
  3. We support children in need. With every job order filled we make a donation to the Oklahoma Baptist Children’s Home (an organization committed to helping feed and clothe the children of Oklahoma).
How does Bridge Career connect qualified people with great jobs? Since the day we began doing business, Bridge Career has been 100% focused on exceeding the expectations of our employers and our employees. We have worked tirelessly to treat others the way we want to be treated. If you find yourself looking for a job, we know that it can be scary out there. Your time is valuable, and we know you want to invest your time in a company that values you and treats you well. In order to insure your relocation experience is the best it can be, we take the time to get to know you and what you are looking for.  We try to find the right career fit for you. How does Bridge Career connect growing companies with exceptional talent?
Bridge Career is constantly interviewing potential employees, and not every employee we interview is a “Bridge Career Fit.” Basically, there are two types of employees out there. There are people committed to doing a great job, and then there are employees simply looking for check in exchange for their time – whether they do good work or not. At Bridge Career we focus on the people who are committed to doing a great job and helping a company meet their overall goals and objectives. At Bridge Career we specialize in providing Tulsa staffing services that allow our employees a chance to shine.
What does the Oklahoma Baptist Children’s Home do and why does Bridge Career support this organization?
The Oklahoma Baptist Children’s Home is an organization dedicated to feeding and clothing children and young adults in Oklahoma. This organization also provides housing and life skills for these young people. OBCH now provides care for girls who are struggling with unplanned pregnancy and the challenges they deal with. The program teaches them how to take care of themselves and their child while learning the skills needed to find a job in the workplace.
